snippet: The latest Quinnipiac University/New York Times/CBS News polls included telephone interviews conducted Oct. 4 through Oct. 9 with a total of 4,449 adults in Colorado, Virginia and Wisconsin.
lead_paragraph: The latest Quinnipiac University/New York Times/CBS News polls included telephone interviews conducted Oct. 4 through Oct. 9 with a total of 4,449 adults in Colorado, Virginia and Wisconsin.
